info.title: Byteplant Phone Number Online Validation
info.description:
Keep in Touch With Your Customers
With the Byteplant Phone Number Validation API you can easily verify if any national or international phone number is valid and callable. Avoid disconnects and increase the performance of your marketing campaigns now!

parameters.name: CountryCode
parameters.description: two letter ISO 3166-1 country code (string); default 'US'

parameters.name: Locale
parameters.description: IETF language tag for Geocoding (string); default 'en-US'
